pullRequest.body: This PR resolves some nolints by adding docstrings for `CommRing` and `CommSemiring`.

nodes.body: Done @eric-wieser
These docstrings existed in Lean 3. Can you see what they were?

> Can you see what they were?

Do you mean these? @YaelDillies 

https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib/blob/65a1391a0106c9204fe45bc73a039f056558cb83/src/algebra/ring/defs.lean#L192C1-L197C67

https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib/blob/65a1391a0106c9204fe45bc73a039f056558cb83/src/algebra/ring/defs.lean#L403C1-L405C59
Yep!
Ok, should I copy-paste them here with the obvious minor adjustments or those committed in this PR are fine?
Done @YaelDillies

maintainer merge

```suggestion
/-- A commutative semiring (`CommSemiring`) is a semiring (`Semiring`)
with commutative multiplication. -/
```
to match the rest of the file (and throughout)

If you're trying to follow the existing docstrings, it would rather be
```suggestion
/-- A commutative semiring is a semiring (`Semiring`)
```
Honestly I see no point in repeating information so clearly accessible from the `extends` clause, so I would rather do
```suggestion
/-- A commutative semiring is a semiring with commutative multiplication. -/
```
Yes, I agree. Committed.
This doesn't look like an improvement
